messages.content: You are an expert technical recruiter evaluating software engineering candidates. Analyze the candidate's background and provide a structured assessment.

**Candidate Profile**

**Name:** Sarah Chen
**Current Role:** Senior Software Engineer at DataFlow Systems
**Location:** San Francisco, CA, United States
**Years of Experience:** 6 years

**Work History:**
• Senior Software Engineer at DataFlow Systems (2021-Present)
  - Led migration of monolithic application to microservices architecture
  - Reduced API latency by 40% through caching optimization
  - Mentored 3 junior engineers

• Software Engineer at CloudTech Inc (2018-2021)
  - Built real-time data processing pipeline handling 1M events/day
  - Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%
  - Tech stack: Python, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, Redis

• Junior Developer at StartupXYZ (2017-2018)
  - Developed REST APIs for mobile application
  - Contributed to frontend using React and TypeScript

**Education:**
• BS Computer Science, Stanford University (2017)
• GPA: 3.8/4.0

**Skills:** Python, Go, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS, Docker, React, TypeScript

**GitHub:** 150+ contributions in past year, maintains 2 open source projects

Please evaluate this candidate.
